item.description: Danbury Bog is described in the Quiet Water book (page 74) and looks like a great place to go with a view of Ragged Mountain. I thought I should get it on our calendar for this year. Bring a lunch and we can paddle right up to the foothills of the mountain. Directions from the junction of Route 4 and 104, go east on Route 104 for 1.0 mile and turn right onto Gould Hill Road. The boat access is 0.3 mile down Gould Hill Road on the right hand side. Hope to see you there!

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Kayak Danbury Bog
